OR.No.{{doc.outward_register_number}}


Date: {{ frappe.format_date(frappe.utils.nowdate(),'dd-MM-yyyy') }}


To, {{doc.employee_name}}

{{doc.designation}} : {{doc.employee}}

Dear {{doc.employee_name}},

Sub: Advise for performance improvement

{% set count=get_count(doc) %} We have been evaluating your performance for the past few weeks and we regret to note that it is not up to the expected level. Below is the snapshot of the points earned by you for the past {{count}} Months. {% set data=get_monthly_points(doc) %} {{data}}


The above points are no way nearer to the expected level and hence need to be accelerated immediately. In view of this your performance will be closely monitored. If you fail to achieve minimum of {{doc.minimum_score or ''}} points by {{ frappe.format_date(doc.last_date_to_achieve_target,'dd-MM-yyyy') }}, we will be under compulsion to take necessary action on you including termination from the service. You are advised to take full support and guidance from the branch/branch head and show visible improvement in your performance.

If you have any questions or concerns about the plan, please do not hesitate to discuss them with your supervisor or HR representative.

Your commitment to this process and dedication to improvement are essential. We believe that with your effort and our support, you can achieve success in meeting and exceeding the performance expectations of your role.

Thank you for your cooperation and dedication to continuous improvement.

Yours truly,


Chandramouli Bharadwaj
Chief Executive Officer

With a request to offer necessary guidance to the CASA Marketing Associate for improvement in marketing skill.
